Activity: Log in to the EHR system, check for any updates or messages. Prepare for the day's patient assessments and vaccinations.
Conduct influenza symptom assessments for new admissions. Ensure all data is entered into the EHR accurately.
Administer influenza vaccinations and document all details in the EHR. Verify patient records for any allergies or contraindications.
Follow up with patients who received vaccinations the previous day. Document any adverse reactions or follow-up needs in the EHR.
Email @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 with updates on vaccination rates and any notable trends in influenza symptoms.
Review and organize vaccination supplies for the next day. Ensure EHR documentation is up to date.
